CustomElementRegistryWhenDefined.summary:
The whenDefined() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that
resolves when the named element is defined.
CustomElementRegistryWhenDefined.returns: A that fulfills with the custom element's constructor when a custom element becomes defined with the given name. If a custom element has already been defined with the name, the promise will immediately fulfill.The promise is rejected with a SyntaxError if the name is not a valid custom element name.
